author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
The Stylistics have released a new album and I'm on it! "Falling In Love With My Girl" is the album and it's me - Justin Hawkins - playing the guitar solo on the title track, so I wanted to tell you about it. There is no video for the song, so I asked my producer to improvise. Unfortunately, she did. It's not clever or funny and we're not talking anymore.  

To listen to more of The Stylistics: https://www.youtube.com/@UCvdxB-s4VxPBZNs9I1P_gTw 

The new Darkness album is released on the 28th March,   you can pre-order 'Dreams On Toast' on CD, vinyl or cassette here: https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/

See The Darkness on tour across the UK this month,  tickets are on sale here: https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

From mid March, watch more episodes of Justin Hawkins Rides Again and find Behind The Scenes footage from The Darkness On Tour on my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides A
title: Soapy Style: It Makes No Sense
